about_the_game:
Disclaimer: Downloading this free game will make you legally obliged to buy any subsequent sequels.

Welcome to Garden of Pizzlerat, the ultimate indie horror/puzzle game that will challenge your mind and test your nerves. You play as a person, a brave adventurer who finds themselves trapped in Pizzlerats's Garden with no way out. But don't worry – you have a secret weapon: The CheesePlacer.

The garden.

Pizzlerat's garden was once a beautiful and thriving place, until one day, all the inhabitants mysteriously vanished without a trace. Now, years later, you must explore the overgrown garden and uncover the truth behind its deserted state.

Characters.

Prepare to embark on a journey like no other, where you'll encounter a vast array of iconic characters - from heroes to villains and everyone in between. You'll have the chance to talk with thousands of fascinating personas - Such as: Pizzlerat. (end of list).

Platforming.

There are many holes and pits and other stuff like that. So you have to jump.

The CheesePlacer.

The CheesePlacer™®© is an innovative tool designed to assist you in solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles in exciting and challenging puzzles. By dispensing delicious cheese onto the ground, the CheesePlacer™®© can attract nearby rats, which can be used to trigger nearby buttons.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game doesn't contain any explicit sexual content, only written references to sexual acts within the game said in a joking manner.
There is blood and violence but mostly depicted in a cartoonish way. There is also a scene of a human animatronic being burnt alive.

name: Garden of Pizzlerat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Any made within the last decade
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any made within the last decade
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any made within the last decade
  • VR Support: No VR support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
